title: Global Third Party Logistics (3PL) Strategic Business Report 2023: Market to Reach $1.9 Trillion by 2030 ... - GlobeNewswire
summary: The global market for Third Party Logistics (3PL) is expected to reach $1.9 trillion by 2030, driven by factors like increasing e-commerce and the need for specialized logistics expertise. The report highlights the role of 3PL providers in navigating complex supply chains and their adaptation to the challenges posed by the COVID-19 pandemic.

title: Retail & Business - E-commerce Vs Traditional Retail: Striking the Balance in India's Evolving Retail Landscape - Indian Retailer
